trigger_description: This trigger fires when the selected lock is unlocked.
This trigger fires when the selected door is closed.
This trigger fires when the selected lock is locked.
This trigger fires when the selected switch is turned on.
This trigger fires when the selected garage door is opened.
This trigger fires when the selected door is opened.
This trigger fires when the selected garage door is closed.
This trigger fires when your abode system mode is changed (Away, Home, Standby).
This trigger fires when an abode alarm is active.
This trigger fires when the selected switch is turned off.
